caption.p: Inhibitory activity of TT against lipid peroxidation and protein denaturation. (a) Percentage lipid peroxidation inhibitory effect of TT in rat brain homogenate; (b) Percentage inhibitory effect of TT on denaturation of albumin. Each bar represents the mean Â± SD of three replicates. TT: Methanol fruit extract of Tetrapleura tetraptera.
